name: Noir in Hong Kong
description:
NOIR IN HONG KONG is a Renpy game in which you collect clues and interrogate suspects by trying to catch them in a web of logic and contradictions.  It isn't 100% finished but hopefully this will motivate me to push onwards and tighten everything up.

I had an idea for a while ago.  This is currently the first chapter until I can get my ideas together. I'd like to be able to hire out some artists in the future to replace my placeholder artworks. 

Things are very janky at the moment and there are some things I'm trying to iron out. Very happy for feedback and will try to make improvements when I can. 

The music used comes courtesy of Julian Winter; His track "L.A." is found in the main menu and his tracks "Journey" and "Acquaintance" are in there too, (licensed under 

Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
